headline: Forensic Document Examiner
summary:
Seasoned graphic designer and craftsman with a new career as a forensic document examiner and counterfeit deterrence specialist.  Given the Forensic Sciences Foundation 2010 Emerging Forensic Scientist Award.  Photography hobbyist. 

I'm an entrepreneur at heart with a million ideas.  My biggest motivator is the phrase "it can't be done."

defaultPosition.description: Conduct examinations of travel and identity documents to determmine authenticity.  Conduct comparitive handwriting examinations to determine authorship.
defaultPosition.title: Forensic Document Examiner

positions.description: Conduct examinations of travel and identity documents to determmine authenticity.  Conduct comparitive handwriting examinations to determine authorship.
positions.title: Forensic Document Examiner

positions.description: Designed print materials for international consumer packaged goods including clients such as Luvs, Folgers, Fifth Third Bank, Prilosec, and others.  Knowledge of paper and other substrate materials for suitability in printing.  Responsibilities included art direction, prepress duties, photography, presentation design, video editing, and web design.  In-house expert on presentation software and techniques.  Intern mentor.  Hand-crafted design mockups and samples.
positions.title: Senior Art Director

positions.description: In charge of creative and technical training team at Apple retail, Cincinnati.  Resident Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, and InDesign expert.  Research specialist able to find unique solutions to particular customer technical problems.  Acquired working knowledge of most Apple professional and consumer software applications.  Earned professional certification on both Apple Aperture and Apple Motion software.  Earned Apple's Product Professional recognition.  Chosen to demo Apple product software at their yearly Macworld Expo in San Francisco.  Completed two week creative training in Cupertino, California.
positions.title: Apple Creative (trainer)

positions.description:
Designed, photographed and wrote copy for various clients including Kelloggs, Hershey, Nestle, and the Cincinnati Zoo.  Chosen to design annual zoo gala invitation using custom metallic inks, spot varnish printing process and custom perforations and die cuts.

Involved in Launch Force, WonderGroup's new product innovation group.  While working with the Launch Force team, used my proficiency in photography and photo manipulation to digitally create non-existing products for consumer testing.
positions.title: Freelance Art Director

positions.description: Design and prepare page layouts for offset printers.  Organized newspaper page layout.  Experience with CTP platesetter.
positions.title: Prepress Production Designer
